title: Horseplay: Labworld Earth Book One
description: She was the best of the best, until they took away her past. He was nobody at all until she came along. In the next 24 hours they face infection, decapitation and orbital bombardment. Then things get serious!A devastating attack. An impossible discovery. Fleet Four assigns the legendary Keryapt Zess to uncover which galactic rival thinks Earth is worth fighting over. Unfortunately, she isn’t exactly who she used to be. Her enemies might be hiding in plain sight, but she can’t remember doing the things which made her so feared and admired. There are only two people she can trust - her Shadow back in Fleet Four and a police photographer who was in the right place at the wrong time - but neither of them knows the whole truth about her. Can they help her stay alive long enough to answer the question - who wants us dead? And what can she do if the answer is “Everyone”?SCWC WINNER - BEST SCIENCE FICTION
author: Cam Daly
